welcome_message_body: Welcome to Madinat Hamad, Bahrain! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Madinat Hamad has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sakhir Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Sakhir Air Base Airport caters to private and charter flights for high-profile individuals and government officials.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for a limited time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
